nodes.title: Support for Spanish has been added.
Add ability to set Look & Feel via environment variable.
Added code-quality assurance tools to pom.xml
Escape abritrary strings in assembler instructions
3X: New docking manger & Build info automation
feat: Diversified font selection & added 'Swap View' keybind
Add scripts and resources to install recaf as GNU/Linux app
3X: Begin laying out UI module skeleton
Be more resilient when trying to fixup CFR class names
Fix #344 cfr inner class name replace
fix: Unknown cli argument crashes application
Popups save location + basic YAML support
Base abstractions for managing decompiler impls
Delete case sensitive duplicates due to windows paths not being case sensitive
Pull UI code into UI module
Fix for assemble cli command and no doc nag for script
feat: Track applied renames in workspace and enable mapping export
fix: use native methods to get class fields
fix: Incorrectly calculated position when highlighting errors
fix: Added support for 'meta' modifier key
fix: Reduce amount of created processes during startup
refactor: More verbose information when creating new JVM.
feat: Added french translation, fixed search button not translated
feat: Add close, close all, close others, copy path buttons to tabs contextual menus
fix: line numbers assigned to correct values
feat: Allow to export programs as ZIP
fix: start Recaf in isolated class loader
fix: Properly load multiple lang files from classpath.
fix: controller initializes before plugin manager loads plugins
fix: NPE if the workspace not initialized
Add Drone CI with semantic versioning
Fix viewports are not cleared after workspace load
Cleaner way to scan for bootstrap classes
Set log file to be generated at Recaf storage directory
Fix MultiANewArray TYPE field incorrect parsing
Cleanup code, prperly start JavaFX thread
Cleaner way to scan for bootstrap classes
Fix NPE when launching Recaf  without workspace
Remove the redundant copying in overlapping results calculation
Fix .class files are exported in a wrong way
Scan boot classpath on JVM 9 and later
Refactor auto-completion, classpath util & related code
Complete support for all allowed annotation value types
Fix a small bug in annotation formatting
Fix some translations and two translation-keys
